entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
